content:
Try this: 

button.email-action-flagged {   &.flagged {     fill: red !important;     stroke: blue !important;   }}


Help/Troubleshooting Info, Profile Folder, Show in Finder (Win: Open Folder), close TB, create a new folder named chrome, create a new document in chrome with a text editor, name it userChrome.css, Save as type: All files *.*, copy in the above code, change the colours as desired. Double-click toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets to true in Settings/General/Config. editor, restart TB.

Online css generator

video: How to create a css file (Firefox or TB)

See picture.

content:
Hi Wayne,

A rough estimate would be that the problem started about five months ago... I changed nothing just prior to this starting. I have perhaps twenty filters, and I have not studied this situation with care that would allow me to tell you if all filters are affected. My Spam folder deletes messages after they sit for more than eight days, and gets that setting from my Account Settings.

I also neglected to say that this problem is intermittent... On occasion, if I reboot the system, the messages will be moved automatically. Sometimes that will happen without a reboot. But far more frequently, I have the problem I have described. content:
Inoltre, Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)

content: Ich vermute, dass es mit dem MacOS X Adressbuch zusammen hängt. Beende Thunderbird, öffne die System-Einstellungen deines Mac, gehe zu Sicherheit & Datenschutz, klicke auf den Reiter Datenschutz, selektiere "Kontakte" in der linken Spalte und deaktiviere "Thunderbird.app" in der rechten Spalte, damit Thunderbird keinen Zugang mehr zu den Kontakten des Mac hat. Dann starte TB wieder und versuche dein Konto einzurichten.
creator: Mapenzi

content:
Das Adressbuch ist sicherlich eine gute Option, insbesondere auf älteren Macs. Die einzige mir bekannte Umgehungslösung für den Fehler besteht darin, den Zugriff auf das Mac-Adressbuch zu deaktivieren, wie bereits beschrieben.

Ich wäre an Ihrer Absturz-ID (unter „Hilfe > Fehlerbehebungsinformationen“) interessiert, um das vorliegende Problem genauer zu identifizieren.

content:
Just a couple of things to try, I don't know how effective they will be. Assuming you are using Windows 11...

  • Go to Settings | Bluetooth & Devices | Printers & Scanners | Printer Preferences . Turn OFF the option "Let Windows manage my default printer." This setting lets applications change your default printer. I would never want that to happen - I want to choose it and I want it to stick.
  • Scroll up and select your new printer and make sure it's designated as Default.

Does that help?

content:
- account settings - click the name of one of the accounts - now, click the 'edit SMTP server' button in lower right - if the email account is correct, then, just for documentation, enter the email address in the Description field and press OK - now, repeat for the other account and click the 'edit SMTP server' button. if it shows the other account, DO NOT change it, but revert back to prior screen and click the dropdown for SMTP server and select the other SMTP server and edit it similarly the the other one.

what you have are two SMTP servers, but in editing, you are continually editing the same one. by changing the Description field , you make it easier to see from the account pane.
creator: davidsk

content:
Still having the issue. In Example1@gmail.com, I went to Account Settings. ‘Outgoing Server’ is specified as Example1@gmail.com - smtp.gmail.com. ‘Edit outgoing server’ shows

Description: Example1@gmail.com Server Name: smtp.gmail.com Port: 465 (Default: 465) Connection security: SSL/TLS Authentication method: OAuth2 User Name: Example1@gmail.com

In Example2@gmail.com, these same settings are in place. In the ‘Outgoing Server’ dropdown, the only gmail setting is for Example1@gmail.com - smtp.gmail.com

If I edit it as Example1, then Example1 has the Example 2 settings. Please clarify.
creator: apogeemail2

content: I tried editing the Description field as suggested, but it still reverted back.
creator: apogeemail2

content:
First, for example2, when you see that the SMTP server is set for example1, my instructions were NOT to edit it. instead, go back to prior screen. to the left of the 'edit smtp server' button is a dropdown menu pointing to SMTP server. click that and select the OTHER SMTP server. It's description field would not show email address. change that one and set is as the one for that account.

Another way, if you're having trouble with those menus, is to select 'account settings' menu, scroll down left side to 'Outgoing Servers SMTP' and press enter. That will bring up a list of all SMTP servers. One will have the description of example1 account. Edit the other one to be the right one for example2, including placing email address in description field. Save and exit.

Now, click account settings and then click account for example2. In lower right, if the link to SMTP server is showing the email address for example1, click the dropdown and select the other one.

If you continue to have problems, please post screenshot of the account pane showing the bottom row that links to SMTP server, and a screenshot of the 'Outgoing server SMTP' pane. thanks
creator: davidsk

content:
Hola, La carpeta de perfiles puede contener mas de un perfil, por ejemplo en alguna actualización o alguna recuperación del Thunderbird se podría haber creado otra carpeta, por lo tanto viendo el contenido la carpeta: 76rg61v7.default no es útil, no haca falta hacer una copia. La carpeta importante es: g3snubiu.default-esr

Este archivo puede ignorarse porque como su nombre lo indica es un reporte y antiguo: 1764189287131.706c0a04-aa31-4173-b29f-b2d220526bf5.main.jsonlz4, ubicado en la ruta C:\Users\Usuario\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\g3snubiu.default-esr\datareporting\archived\2025-11.

Por lo general yo guardo la carpeta de perfil completa, ahora por lo que observo de las imágenes que adjunto la herramienta de exportación copia solo las carpetas con sus datos (cuentas, correos, calendarios, etc) e ignora el resto porque son reportes, miniaturas de imágenes, cache temporal, extensiones)

Yo conservaría ambas copias .

Agradeceríamos marcar como solucionada/útil para que sirva a otros usuarios. ¡Gracias!
creator: pcp04

content: If it is reordered when done, but reverts when restarted, that is an indication that thunderbird is being prevented from updating settings at shut down. That is usually caused by a VPN or an anti-virus attempting interference. If you use an antivirus other than the default Windows antivirus, or a VPN, please adjust settings to bypass email checking. you can sometimes verify this by seeing if there is more than one prefs.js in the profile (such a prefs-1.js, prefs-2.js). click help>troubleshootinginformation, scroll to 'profile folder', click 'open folder'. You will now be in the profile. Is there just one prefs.js there?
creator: davidsk

content:

When i checked Profile Folder there are several prefs.js files (prefs, prefs-1, ..prefs-3.js) but pref-x files are very old dated. pref.js is new. I tried to close protection in ESET and tried again but it was same.

Thanks

content:
david said
I did a web search and found this: https://thunderbird.macupdate.com/app/mac/11942/thunderbird/old-versions

That list is outdated when Tb 115.18.0esr was the last Thunderbird version to still support the EOL macOS 10.12, 10.13, 10.14 and not the older Tb 115.12.2esr.

Thunderbird and Firefox from 116.0 to current versions requires macOS 10.15 (ten.fifteen) at minimum to run.

Firefox 115.31.0esr is the current version to support macOS 10.12, 10.13, 10.14 https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/firefox-users-macos-1012-1013-1014-moving-to-extended-support
creator: James

content:
wwplyr said
So do I just copy all of the listed files(?) to get the complete program? Or is there a downlink somewhere? Thanks for the info, BTW

In https://archive.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/releases/115.18.0/mac/ pick your language which is likely one of the English options as in en-CA, en-GB, en-US (Canadian, United Kingdom (Great Britain), US) then download the Thunderbird 115.18.0.dmg file.

This article gives you the basics on how to install the Thunderbird dmg file you downloaded. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/installing-thunderbird-on-mac

content:
1. Change the spacing how? Insert a paragraph after enter you change the style to an from body in the toolbar where it generally either says paragraph of body.

2. Alt+1 on the keyboard. Or right click a tab and tell it to close all others. It will not close the inbox tab. So you are never more than one click away form the folder pane with inbox

3. If I recall correctly there is an addon that does that. Personally I do not want it to assume anything for me. So really It is not something I know about. I am not even sure which folder I might be interested in when the program starts. If depends on which get new mail after the program starts.

4. What scrolling text. Do you mean tabs where you have perhaps every email you ever double clicked on open to read still open. For a cure see 2.

5. No idea. It open this page for me in Thunderbird 140.6ESR https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/products/thunderbird That page also opens whenever you press F1 anywhere in Thunderbird, not just when the menu is showing. Could it be you have some sort of issue with your software firewall that is blocks the link in Thunderbird.

Try navigating to the addons and themes on the menu and search for theme in the search box. Do you get a returned result showing some themes you could install or some sort of error. 

Are you are using a non English version of Thunderbird.  What language identifier is in the link that opens?  The one I posted is en_us  but that language is generally picked up from the operating system locale and the IP address the server it accessed from, therefore the link opened can be different with regards to language to Thunderbird. The  language information is determined in the browser, not Thunderbird.  The link it passes to the browser in this instance is https://support.mozilla.org/products/thunderbird and the web server allocates a language into the URL based on your browser settings
